original_title: พ่อตาต๊ะติ๊งโหน่ง
overview: Whan, the daughter of a village headman, meets a veterinarian on her way home when he helps fix her broken down car. She takes him home to meet her family. Her father suspects she will get involved with him. As he has hopes for her to marry the district officer's son he does everything he can to prevent this from happening.
title: Crazy Father
